channel.title: ShadowsPK beta STAGE #1 'PKing masness!'
channel.description:
[CENTER][URL=http://"http://www.shadowspk.cpm"][IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/mrz5gl.png[/img][/URL]
[B][SIZE=5] Greetings and welcome to shadowspk.[/SIZE][/B][/CENTER] [B] [SIZE=5][color=blue]This is the first stage of the beta period, we are going to test the combat pvp in this stage. There will be a one week of [COLOR="#FF0000"]free item spawning[/COLOR]!!!!. The purpose of this stage is to test combat pvp and of course to have FUN!! [/SIZE][B] There will be many contests, events and valuable rewards![/B] [B] After this stage there will be a full eco reset, but the pk points will not be reseted, they will be gained in small sums. After this stage there be other unique stages of beta, and i will update the thread when the time comes. [/B] [B]This was a description for the first stage of the beta period, now for the server features:[/B] [CENTER][SIZE=3] 1.Survival mini-game 2. Zombies Kill Zone mini-game 3. almost 100% Blast Furnace mini-game 4. Great pking and hybriding with the best combat system. 5. All skilling are working perfectly 6. Bosses 7. Real dicing through clan-chat. 8. Ring of Wealth 9. Automatic Double Xp weekends 10. Clipped Following 11. Slayer Point System 12. Amazing treasure trails!! 13. highsores 14. Unique donator's zone [/SIZE][/CENTER] media: [CENTER][SPOILER=videos][video=youtube_share;eijynjYrvB8]http://youtu.be/eijynjYrvB8[/video][/SPOILER]

item.title: ShadowsPK beta STAGE #1 'PKing masness!'
item.dc:creator: @shadowspk shadowspk
item.description:
@shadowspk wrote:

[CENTER][URL=http://“http://www.shadowspk.cpm”][/URL]

[B][SIZE=5]
Greetings and welcome to shadowspk.[/SIZE][/B][/CENTER]
[B]
[SIZE=5][color=blue]This is the first stage of the beta period, we are going to test the combat pvp in this stage.
There will be a one week of [COLOR="#FF0000"]free item spawning[/COLOR]!!!. The purpose of this stage is to test combat pvp and of course to have FUN!!
[/SIZE][B]
There will be many contests, events and valuable rewards![/B]
[B]
After this stage there will be a full eco reset, but the pk points will not be reseted, they will be gained in small sums.
After this stage there be other unique stages of beta, and i will update the thread when the time comes.
[/B]
[B]This was a description for the first stage of the beta period, now for the server features:[/B]
[CENTER][SIZE=3]
1.Survival mini-game
2. Zombies Kill Zone mini-game
3. almost 100% Blast Furnace mini-game
4. Great pking and hybriding with the best combat system.
5. All skilling are working perfectly
6. Bosses
7. Real dicing through clan-chat.
8. Ring of Wealth
9. Automatic Double Xp weekends
10. Clipped Following
11. Slayer Point System
12. Amazing treasure trails!!
13. highsores
14. Unique donator’s zone
[/SIZE][/CENTER]
